subprocessors.name: Google
subprocessors.description: Customers may choose to contact Markprompt via email. Markprompt uses Google as its primary email service provider. Markprompt does not require nor encourage disclosure of Personal Data via email, however the potential for Personal Data being transmitted to Markprompt remains.

subprocessors.name: Nango
subprocessors.description: Markprompt uses Nango to synchronize data between customer sources and Markprompt.

subprocessors.name: Resend
subprocessors.description: Markprompt uses Resend to send your transactional emails about our services.

subprocessors.name: Stripe
subprocessors.description: Markprompt uses Stripe to process credit cards and payments.

subprocessors.name: Supabase
subprocessors.description: Markprompt uses Supabase for data storage.

subprocessors.name: Vercel
subprocessors.description: Markprompt uses Vercel for cloud computing and hosting.
